sqlMap.statement: SELECT TM.TECH_TOC_CD FROM TECH_MSTR TM WHERE TM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND TM.TECH_TOC_CD = #techCd# AND TM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM = 1 GROUP BY TM.TECH_TOC_CD

SELECT FV.FSR_VISIT_NUM FROM FSR F , FSR_VISIT FV WHERE F.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND F.FSR_NUM = #fsrNum# AND F.GLBL_CMPY_CD = FV.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND F.FSR_NUM = FV.FSR_NUM AND FV.FSR_VISIT_LTST_FLG = 'Y' AND F.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
